text: Zinc phosphate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is . It is a salt made of zinc and phosphate ions. ==Properties== Zinc phosphate is a white solid. It does not dissolve in water. It can react with strong acids to make phosphoric acid and a zinc salt. ==Preparation== It can be made by reacting zinc with phosphoric acid. It is normally made by reacting zinc oxide and magnesium oxide with a mixture of phosphoric acid, water, and a buffer. ==Uses== It is used as a cement in dentistry. It rarely is found as a mineral. ==Related pages== *Zinc sulfate Category:Phosphates Category:Zinc compounds
title: Zinc phosphate
